dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Halt, intruder! What business do you have in these forsaken fields?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek passage through this land.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passage? None shall pass without facing the wrath of the undead. What say you to that?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not wish to engage in conflict. Allow me safe passage.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Safe passage? The weak beg for mercy. You will find none here. What now, coward?
Leave, coward. You are not worthy of battle.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be threatened. Prepare for a fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Face the might of the Boneclaw!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am a traveler seeking knowledge of this land.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Curiosity led you to your demise. What do you seek to know, fool?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to learn more about the undead and their ways.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The ways of the undead are not for the living. Your curiosity will be your downfall. What now?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand the reason behind the darkness that plagues this land.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Darkness has no reason, only hunger. Your quest for understanding is pointless. What next?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to cleanse this land of its unholy presence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cleanse? Ha! Your arrogance is matched only by your ignorance. What do you plan to do, crusader?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not rest until the undead are vanquished from these lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal. Your crusade ends here, in the grasp of the Boneclaw!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps there is room for negotiation. Let us find a peaceful solution.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful solution? The undead know only one path. The path of destruction. What now?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no quarrel with the undead. I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: No quarrel? No harm? Words of deceit. The Boneclaw sees through your lies. What is your true intent?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking only to pass through unharmed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? The undead do not heed such pleas. You shall find no respite here. Choose your path, deceiver.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your suspicion. Let me prove my sincerity through actions, not words.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Actions speak louder than words, yet your presence alone is an affront. What action will you take, deceiver?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge the might of the undead. Prepare for battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge? Bold words from a foolish mortal. The Boneclaw hunger for battle. Will you sate its appetite?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no undead. Let our blades clash!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery or foolishness, mortal? The Boneclaw will relish the battle. Prepare for your end!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense a formidable foe in you. Let us not engage in unnecessary bloodshed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise words, yet weakness is not tolerated. The Boneclaw cares not for your perception. What now?
